docs.snippet: Next summer’s Lincoln Center Festival will bring together the Paris Opera Ballet, New York City Ballet and the Bolshoi Ballet for the work’s 50th anniversary.

headline.main: Celebrating Balanchine’s ‘Jewels’ With an International Flair

docs.abstract: Lincoln Center Festival will celebrate 50th anniversary of George Balanchine's Jewels with five performances by members of Paris Opera Ballet, New York City Ballet and Bolshoi Ballet.

docs.snippet: A criminal ring is diverting as much as $5 million in advertising revenue a day in a scheme to show video ads to phantom internet users.

headline.print_headline: Selling Ads on Fake Sites, Russian Ring Steals Up to $5 Million Daily
headline.main: Russian Cyberforgers Steal Millions a Day With Fake Sites

docs.snippet: The photo-sharing social network, which is owned by Facebook, is offering users the ability to share live videos and ephemeral messages.

headline.print_headline: New Instagram Features Mimic Rivals’ Tools
headline.main: Instagram Introduces New Features That Mimic Twitter and Snap Tools

docs.abstract: Instagram announces it is rolling out both live video and ephemeral messaging in order to remain competitive; new features are similar to those offered by Twitter and Snapchat.

docs.snippet: After the murder of Chico Mendes in 1988, a new brand of green governance developed on Brazil’s rain forest frontier, but political instability poses fresh threats.

docs.abstract: After the murder of Chico Mendes in 1988, a new brand of green governance developed on Brazil’s rain forest frontier, but political instability poses fresh threats.
